name: Getting Swole With Ricky
description:
Getting Swole With Ricky, 

(A game made for the Make A Thing September 2017 Game Jam.  The Theme Words were; Prolong, Staccato, and Mass. )

In Getting Swole With Ricky Your job is to collect the falling weights and evenly distribute them to each side of the bar that Ricky is holding up. Whilst making sure that Ricky's weight isn't weirdly proportioned. There are 5 different type of weights Generated to the  cluster of music. These 5 different weights are separately introduced at certain time point in the game,  Increasing in weight and speed. Ricky has 5 different sides that a change depending on the weight on ether side. 

How to Win:

- Reach the 5th and final form of weight (250) on both sides of Ricky.

How To Lose:

- Not do the above before 2 minutes and 30 seconds

- Be 2 stages of weight higher on one side than the other.

Controls:

- Press 'Left Arrow' Key to slightly to the left. (Spam to move faster)

- Press 'Right Arrow' Key to slightly to the Right. (Spam to move faster)

- 'Esc' To Escape to the Main Menu.

- 'R' to restart the level.

Developers:
